body:
I have added the clean command to the configure script.

Is it safe to use `--expunge_async` and then immediately run the fetch command? That is, does `--expunge_async` move/rename the root of the output directory and deletes asynchronously so that any new fetch/build commands that are run while the delete is still happening will be run in a clean output dir?
